attributes.action: subsidise the operation of electric/ hybrid cars in all cities of UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cars are a major cause of green house gases and climate change. The technology for electric cars has now matured and it is time to develop their market. I want the government to make policy changes so that owners of electric cars have to pay reduced or no tax ( such as parking, road, car tax etc,etc) for a period of atleast 5 years to help develop the market of electric cars. Even a small step like the above can go a long way in tackling climate change as studies have shown that maximum of car journeys take place within cities. 

Regards
Rohit Singh
